title: Random Disconnections
body:
Hello! 

I have been playing quite a fair bit lately, and starting yesterday I've started randomly being disconnected from the game and constantly alerted to being 'unable to connect to the server and to try to reconnect' after being stuck on a black screen for the game load in. My internet is running fine, yet this randomly happens. I stopped playing yesterday after the first time it happened, and decided to try again today in which I managed to play 2-3 games without any problem, but it has just started up again.

Relaunching the client doesn't seem to do anything for it, and trying to reconnect to the server keeps me on black screen.

What's going on? And furthermore, how can I stop it?

replies.body: I am having this same problem. can't even play a single game though.
Have you managed to get into matches, or does it crash right out during the match load in?
Can't even start a game now. This is just great.

Ah, no good.
I've been locked out of my current match for 25 minutes now, according to my friend.

cant even enter. dont even reach the loading screen. yesterday had a great match then second one took me nearly 20 minutes before it finally let me back in.
So far all future attempts have failed for me.

That's pretty much with me too. Played plenty of fine matches, then got DC'd around 5 minutes into one of them for almost 20 mins. Played a few today without problem and then sudden disconnect not even 2 minutes into the match. :s This really sucks, hopefully it gets fixed soon.

have the same issue. 
Unable to connect to the sever. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game.

I'm getting the same issue.  Telstra cable in South Aus.

Have tried reconnecting, closing and re-opening client (including cancelling all related processes), rebooting PC and resetting modem.  Nothing works.
I am also Telstra in SA...I think it might be them
Having the same issue. It's going to cost me my promo series.
Yup, thanks Riot for that. Fix servers please or at least enable loss prevented so that more people don't get stung by this.
Aye, we can only hope.
They just need to see this and turn Loss Prevented on ranked. Would also like the lp i just lost refunded, but i know it doesn't work like that.
Indeed. It's unfair to have the losses total because of this.. Guess it's time to avoid playing until they fix it.
Yikes, that's no good. I've only been DC'd from normals thankfully. But worried about getting banned.. Could be our internet providers or the server, dunno
Yeah, I'm grinding ranked to get better rewards than last season. Real hard with this shit happening.

JUST WAIT TILL UR PLACED IN A LOW PRIORITY QUE FOR IT...HAHA.
Riots blessing for us.

Exact same thing happening to me. I couldn't get in to games for a while (black screen), but that problem randomly went away. Now i face disconnections constantly even when my ping is 25 and everything else is running fine. Really confused.

Same here .... nothing works, even closing client etc. Odd thing is, I fired up the client again with a mate's logonid and got straight in. I then logged off and tried to reconnect to my own game and couldn't.
Riot, i have been placed inappropriately in low priority queues to this bug. Please remove this immediately.
Ouch, that sucks. Are you with Telstra, by any chance?
Yup. Still shouldn't have to wait 10 minutes to start a game though because of a bug. This needs to be removed. Now.
I agree. I think it may be time to complain to the ISPs aha, and see what Riot can follow up with.
What is the point in taking anything up with Telstra? They don't care. They make enough money not to. Now i am stuck waiting to start a game rather than playing.
Sad but true.
Sent an email to Riot. Wish me luck.
Oh, do let me know if they are able to help out or not!
Nope, they did not.{{item:3070}}
Welp, that really sucks..
That equates to almost two whole ranked games providing they go well. If i were to afk in games deliberately, then i would have no issue, but this is ridiculous.

have the same issue. Unable to connect to the sever. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game.

I've tried all the port forwarding dns flush resting router. I have zero internet issues on my end and can connect to the menu however cannot connect to the game. happen once in a normal yesterday now twice today would be lovely if the sever issue was fix.
Are you with Telstra? As it seems that the problem may be with them
Just finally hit reconnect successfully after 30 minutes of being disconnected. It appears that it is Telstra's issues, if you are with them.
